allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial release: Claude Code Home Assistant Add-on

Features:
- Web terminal \(ttyd\) accessible from HA sidebar via ingress
- Claude Code CLI for AI-assisted automation creation and debugging
- Read-write access to Home Assistant configuration
- hass-mcp integration for direct HA entity/service interaction
- Multi-architecture support \(amd64, aarch64, armv7, armhf, i386\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
v1.1.0: Enhanced configuration and process management

New features:
- Model selection \(sonnet, opus, haiku\)
- Terminal customization \(font size 10-24px, dark/light themes\)
- Session persistence via tmux
- s6-overlay service definitions for better process supervision
- Shell aliases: c, cc, ha-config, ha-logs
- Welcome banner with configuration info
- Container health checks

Improvements:
- Python 3.12 Alpine base image
- Better architecture-specific ttyd installation
- Enhanced configuration validation
- Improved error messages

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
v1.2.0: Security fix - let Claude Code handle authentication

Security improvements:
- Removed API key from add-on config
- Claude Code handles authentication itself \(more secure\)
- Credentials stored in Claude''s secure directory

Build fixes:
- Simplified Dockerfile - use Alpine''s ttyd package
- Removed BUILD_ARCH variable that caused build failures
- Cleaner, more reliable build process

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
